attributes.action: Allow the option to vote against any of the petitions on this website.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On browsing through this site one often comes across the ill-thought out mental bilge of the intellectually stunted and morally dead. We should have the right to register that we object to petitions calling for the castration of foreigners or the substitution of the working class for foxes in fox-hunting, rather than scrolling on down in impotent fury.

rejection.details: We will treat this as feedback on the petitions system.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
